Reference

All functions

calc_aucs()

Calculate AUROC and AUPRC

default_hyperparams

Default model hyperparameters

define_cv()

Define Cross-Validation Scheme and Training Parameters

find_permuted_auc()

Get permuted AUROC difference for a single feature (or group of features)

flatten_corr_mat()

Flatten correlation matrix to pairs

get_caret_dummyvars_df()

Get dummyvars dataframe (i.e. design matrix)

get_caret_processed_df()

Get preprocessed dataframe for continuous variables

get_corr_feats()

Identify correlated features

get_feature_importance()

Get feature importance using permutation method

get_tuning_grid()

Generate the Tuning Grid for Tuning Hyperparameters

group_correlated_features()

Group correlated features

mutate_all_types()

Mutate all columns with type.convert

otu_large

Large OTU abundance dataset

otu_medium

Medium-sized OTU abundance dataset

otu_mini

Mini OTU abundance dataset

otu_mini_cv5

5-fold cross validation on train_data_mini

otu_mini_results1

Results from running the pipline with L2 logistic regression on otu_mini

otu_sm_cv5

5-fold cross validation on train_data_sm

otu_sm_results1

Results from running the pipline with L2 logistic regression on otu_small

otu_small

Small OTU abundance dataset

preprocess_data()

Preprocess data prior to running machine learning

process_bin_feats()

Process binary features

process_nonbin_feats()

Preprocess nonbinary features

process_novar_feats()

Process features with no variation

run_ml()

Run the machine learning pipeline

setup_parallel()

Register a cluster for parallel processing

stop_parallel()

Unregsiter a parallel processing cluster

test_data_mini

A test data partition from otu_mini

test_data_sm

A test data partition from otu_small

train_data_mini

A training data partition from otu_mini

train_data_sm

A training data partition from otu_small

trained_model_mini

A trained model from L2 logistic regression on train_data_mini

trained_model_sm1

A trained model from L2 logistic regression on train_data_sm
